field.label: Enable
field.comment: Enable or disable Google Tag Manager

field.label: Use GTM split snippet
field.comment: Using split snippet is recommended setting.

field.label: Google Tag Manager Code (Head)
field.comment: Obtain in GTM / Admin / Install Google Tag Manager / HEAD

field.label: Google Tag Manager Code (Body)
field.comment: Obtain in GTM / Admin / Install Google Tag Manager / BODY

field.label: Measurement ID
field.comment: Google Analytics 4 Measurement ID

field.label: Disable by IP
field.comment: Specify IP address(es) that will have the module disabled per visit

field.label: Disable customer non-id by IP
field.comment: Specify IP address(es) that will have force the module to simulate always non-logged customer. Suitable for cache warmers.

field.label: Enable Adwords Conversion Tracking
field.comment: With Google Ads conversion tracking, you can see how effectively your ad clicks lead to valuable customer activity, such as website purchases, phone calls, app downloads, newsletter sign-ups, and more.

field.label: Implementation type
field.comment: Choose implementation type.

field.label: Google Ads Conversion ID
field.comment: Required

field.label: Google Ads Conversion Label
field.comment: Optional

field.label: Google Ads Conversion currency
field.comment: Optional

field.label: Google Ads Conversion color
field.comment: Optional

field.label: Google Ads Conversion format
field.comment: Optional

field.label: Global site tag
field.comment: Obtain in Google Ads -> (3 dot icon) -> Measurement -> Conversions -> Edit/Create Conversion -> Tag Setup

field.label: Conversion event
field.comment: Conversion event name. Possible values: conversion, purchase

field.label: Google Ads Dynamic Remarketing ecomm_prodid
field.comment: Allows for ecomm_prodid to be either ID or SKU. Default: SKU

field.label: Remarketing Required Cookie Consent Mode
field.comment: Pick a consent signal that is required for pushing fireRemarketingTag event into dataLayer[] object

field.label: Enable Google Ads Dynx_
field.comment: Enable customn dynx_ parameters

field.label: Add Enhanced Conversions support
field.comment: If enabled, the module will push 'enhanced_conversion_data' variable into dataLayer[] object

field.label: Add Automated Discounts support
field.comment: Enables automated discounts

field.label: AW Merchant Id
field.comment: The Merchant Center ID. Provide this parameter if you submit an item in several Merchant Center accounts and you want to control from which Merchant Center the itemâ€™s data, for example, its COGS, should be read.

field.label: AW Feed Country
field.comment: The country associated with the feed where your items are uploaded. Use CLDR territory codes. Example: US

field.label: AW Feed Language
field.comment: The language associated with the feed where your items are uploaded. Use ISO 639-1 language codes. Example: EN

field.label: Merchant ID
field.comment: Your Merchant Center ID. You can get this value from the Google Merchant Center.

field.label: Badge position
field.comment: Sets badge render position on screen

field.label: Enable GTIN
field.comment: Send products GTIN

field.label: GTIN attribute
field.comment: Set GTIN product attribute

field.label: Meta Pixel code
field.comment: Obtain from AdManager -> Actions > View Pixel Code in Pixels page

field.label: Meta Conversions API Access token
field.comment: In Events Manager, select the pixel that you have implemented in your website. Click the Settings tab and scrolldown to the Conversions API section. Click the Generate access token link and copy the access token.

field.label: Conversions API Test Event Code (optional)
field.comment: A test event code to use for testing purposes. Must be removed in production mode.

field.label: Meta Pixel Required Cookie Consent Mode
field.comment: Pick an event that will fire Facebook pixel

field.label: Meta content_ids[] attribute
field.comment: Allows for content_ids[] to be either ID or SKU. Default: SKU

field.label: Add to Cart selector
field.comment: Default: //button[@id="product-addtocart-button"]

field.label: Add to Cart selector (in listings)
field.comment: Default: div/div/div/div/div/form/button[contains(@class,"tocart")]

field.label: Remove from Cart selector
field.comment: Default: //a[contains(@class,"action-delete")]|//a[contains(@class,"remove")]

field.label: Impression list selector
field.comment: Default: //ol[contains(@class, "products")]/li

field.label: Impression click selector
field.comment: Default: div/a

field.label: Impression cross sell selector
field.comment: Default: //div[contains(@class,"product-items")]/div

field.label: Widget list selector
field.comment: Default: //ol[contains(@class,"product-items")]/li

field.label: Widget list click selector
field.comment: Default: div/a[contains(@class,"product-item-photo")]

field.label: Widget list add cart selector
field.comment: Default: div/div/div/div/button[contains(@class,"tocart")]

field.label: Add to Wishlist selector
field.comment: Default: //a[contains(@class,"towishlist")]

field.label: Add to Compare selector
field.comment: Default: //a[contains(@class,"tocompare")]

field.label: Add to Wishlist selector (in listings)
field.comment: Default: div/div/div/div/div[contains(@class,"towishlist")]

field.label: Remove from wishlist selector
field.comment: Default: div/div/div/a[contains(@class,"delete")]

field.label: Wishlist items
field.comment: Default: //ol[contains(@class,"product-items")]/li

field.label: Wishlist items Add to cart selector
field.comment: Default: div/div/div/fieldset/div/div/button

field.label: Add to Compare selector (in listings)
field.comment: Default: div/div/div/div/div[contains(@class,"tocompare")]

field.label: Pre-processing strip
field.comment: Strip and restore inline HTML prior to pre-processing data-* selectors

field.label: Optimize scripts
field.comment: If enabled, the module will optimize scripts and render them directly in HTML source code instead of adding them in head.

field.label: Compress scripts
field.comment: Minify and compress inline scripts

field.label: Debug mode
field.comment: In Debug mode, the module will display payload information about backend orders, refunds, reverse transactions etc.

field.label: Use built-in settings
field.comment: Google Tag Manager API configuration settings

field.label: Throttle
field.comment: A lower value will slow down API completion time but will avoid quota limitations

field.label: Universal Analytics Tracking ID
field.comment: ex.: UA-000000-01. (deprecated)

field.label: Account ID
field.comment: Google Tag Manager Account ID ex.: 19671043.

field.label: Configure AdWords Dynamic Remarketing
field.comment: If enabled, the API will create AdWords Dynamic Remarketing tag

field.label: AdWords Conversion ID
field.comment: Used for AdWords Dynamic Remarketing

field.label: AdWords Conversion label
field.comment: Used for AdWords Dynamic Remarketing

field.label: Track server-side ONLY
field.comment: If enabled, the extension will track frontend orders via measurement protocol ONLY. All other events will still be tracked using client-side implementation. ATTENTION: If enabled, 'purchase' event will not be pushed into dataLayer[] object on success page.

field.label: Keep 'purchase' event
field.comment: ATTENTION! If you enable this option, transactions may get duplicated. Make sure to remove EE4 Purchase tag to prevent this from happening.

field.label: Track offline orders
field.comment: If enabled, the extension will track admin orders using Google Analytics Measurement Protocol

field.label: Track canceled orders
field.comment: If enabled, the extension will send a negative transaction to Google Analytics to cancel existing record.

field.label: Track refunds
field.comment: If enabled, the extension will send a refund request upon creating Credit Memo

field.label: Implementation type
field.comment: Choose implementation type. In Assisted mode, you MUST install Google Optimize via tag in GTM itself. This mode is used to insert page hiding snippet ONLY.

field.label: Google Optimize Page Hiding Snippet
field.comment: To reduce the page flicker and give users a better user experience it's optional that you add the page hiding snippet to your webpages.

field.label: Identifier
field.comment: Select identifier attribute. Default: SKU

field.label: Use category segments
field.comment: Allows for filtering reports by category level

field.label: No translation
field.comment: Use admin labels for product variants. If enabled, current store will be pushed in dataLayer[] to allow for separating results using custom dimension.

field.label: Use simple SKU(s) only
field.comment: Applicable for configurable products. If enabled, module will send simple SKU instead of parent SKU. Variant will be kept intact. May result in incorrect correlation between products click/add to cart and performance reports.

field.label: Use first variant SKU(s)
field.comment: If enabled, ecomm_prodid[] (AdWords Dynamic Remarketing) will be set to the first variant from the configurable product. Applicable for product detail page only.

field.label: Brand attribute
field.comment: Default: manufacturer

field.label: Brand delimiter
field.comment: Default: comma

field.label: Use remove confirmation
field.comment: If enabled, the site will display a confirmation popup to customers upon removing product(s) from shopping cart.

field.label: Use localStorage
field.comment: If enabled, the extension will use a localStorage feature to better correlate categories with add/remove/checkout events. Provides more accurate reports for products in multiple categories. Note that this feature will work only on modern browsers that support localStorage.

field.label: Filter-out payment method
field.comment: Orders/Transactions made using selected methods will not be tracked in Google Analytics. Filtering out transactions by payment method is suitable for finance options or transactions that are paid/processed later and/or are likely to not process.

field.label: Add 'list' parameter in detail actionField
field.comment: Add 'list' parameter in detail JSON.

field.label: Activate Private Fallback
field.comment: Private Fallback will send Pageview data to Google Analytics via server-side call if browser is in Private/Incognito mode.

field.label: Enable summary cart callback
field.comment: If enabled, the module will push cart contents into dataLayer[] after events such as addToCart, removeFromCart, cart update etc. e.g. dataLayer.event.summary[]

field.label: Reset dataLayer[] object
field.comment: If enabled, data pushed in dataLayer[] will get reset prior to next push. This is most useful with a page that will remain open and the data layer size continues to grow over time.

field.label: Transaction revenue
field.comment: Modifies 'revenue' parameter e.g. total transaction value

field.label: Transaction product item price
field.comment: Modifies 'price' parameter e.g. product price in items array [] for 'purchase' event only.

field.label: Payload product item price
field.comment: Modifies 'price' parameter e.g. product price in items array [] for all types of events

field.label: Google Ads total value
field.comment: Modifies 'ecomm_totalvalue' parameter e.g. google_tag_params.ecomm_totalvalue (on success page)

field.label: Enable AMP
field.comment: Add support for AMP (Accelerated Mobile Pages)

field.label: Enable affiliate tracking
field.comment: Add support for affiliate tracking

field.label: Affiliate parameter
field.comment: Parameter to look for in URL/request to map session to affilaiate. Ex.: /?aff=

field.label: Affiliate custom dimension index
field.comment: Custom dimension index (obtain from Google Analytics). Should be product-scoped dimension. Defaults to 20.

field.label: Enable Internal Search tracking
field.comment: Add support for internal search tracking. Searched queries will be correlated with other data such as impression, events and transactions.

field.label: Search dimension index
field.comment: Custom dimension index (obtain from Google Analytics). Should be product-scoped dimension. Defaults to 18.

field.label: Enable Cookie Consent
field.comment: Enable EUROPA Cookie Consent Directive

field.label: Consent mode
field.comment: Select consent mode

field.label: Consent Widget
field.comment: Set desired display behaviour

field.label: Widget color
field.comment: Choose background color. Default: rgb(255,255,255) e.g. White

field.label: Widget color gradient end
field.comment: Choose background color. Default: rgb(255,255,255) e.g. White

field.label: Check all by default
field.comment: Display consent checkboxes as selected by default.

field.label: Initialize dataLayer[] on DECLINE
field.comment: If enabled, the dataLayer[] object will still get initialized. Default consent states will remain denied. In this case 'gcs' parameter in network request will remain G100 (No consent has been granted)

field.label: Border radius
field.comment: Set GDRP popup border radius in pixels. Default: 8

field.label: Background color
field.comment: Choose background color. Default: rgb(255,255,255) e.g. White

field.label: Text color
field.comment: Choose text color. Default: rgb(0,0,0) e.g. Black

field.label: Close icon color
field.comment: Choose background color. Default: rgb(255,255,255) e.g. White

field.label: Customize text link color
field.comment: Choose background color. Default: rgb(255,255,255) e.g. White

field.label: Accept link color
field.comment: Choose accept link color. Default: rgb(0,0,0) e.g. Black

field.label: Checkbox color
field.comment: Choose checkbox color. Default: rgb(0,0,0) e.g. Black

field.label: "Confirm" link text
field.comment: Modifies confirmation link text

field.label: "Confirm all" link text
field.comment: Modifies confirmation all link text

field.label: "Thank you" text
field.comment: Modifies "thank you" text

field.label: "Learn more" link text
field.comment: Modifies "Learn more" link text

field.label: "Learn more" link URL
field.comment: Modifies "Learn more" link URL address

field.label: Display DECLINE button
field.comment: Shows a DECLINE button in widget. Click on this butto will fire a cookieConsentDeclined event

field.label: "Decline" link text
field.comment: Modifies "Decline" link text

field.label: Customize link text
field.comment: Modifies CUSTOMIZE link text

field.label: Customize link close text
field.comment: Modifies CUSTOMIZE link text when customize panel is visible

field.label: Stock dimension index
field.comment: Set stock dimension index. Should match the index set in your Google Analytics profile. Type: product-scoped

field.label: Enable Performance API
field.comment: Performance API is an experimental feature that will send page performance metrics to Google Analytics. This can allow you to identify how your page performs by aggregating a collective performance data
